summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Tract B, Plat of Calvary Cemetery, located on the northeast corner of 30th Avenue N.E. and East 50th St. and all of County Road adjoining said Tract "B", with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-457 and 17-330 respectively.
